scripts.start: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run create-dirs && npm run install:all
scripts.create-dirs: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['server/uploads', 'server/output', 'server/temp'].forEach(dir => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); });"
